briefTitle: Comparison Study of Letrozole Alone or Letrozole With Zoledronic Acid in Early Breast Cancer, Neoadjuvant Therapy
officialTitle: Randomized Multi-Center Study Comparing Prolonged Primary Systemic Endocrine Therapy With Letrozole Alone or in Combination With Zoledronic Acid in Early Breast Cancer (NEOadjuvant Study in CANada)
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria

* Postmenopausal women
* Newly diagnosed with non metastatic breast cancer
* Candidate for mastectomy or breast-conserving surgery

Exclusion Criteria

* Patients with invasive tumors
* Patients receiving anti-cancer treatment
* Patients who have undergone surgery

Other protocol-defined exclusion criteria may apply.
